original_text: Shall the axe boast itself against him that heweth therewith? or shall the saw magnify itself against him that shaketh it? as if the rod should shake itself against them that lift it up, or as if the staff should lift up itself, as if it were no wood.
korean_text: 도끼가 어찌 찍는 자에게 스스로 자랑하겠으며 톱이 어찌 켜는 자에게 스스로 큰 체하겠느냐 이는 막대기가 자기를 드는 자를 움직이려 하며 몽둥이가 나무 아닌 사람을 들려 함과 같음이로다

sentences.original_text: or shall the saw magnify itself
as if the rod should shake itself
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 막대기가 그것을 드는 자들을 흔들 것 같으며

sentences.original_text: against them that lift it up,
or as if the staff should lift up itself,
sentences.korean_translation: 또 지팡이가 스스로 들리는 것 같으리니

sentences.original_text: as if it were no wood.
